title: Passion
verses: Romans 12:11 (WEB) — "Not lagging in diligence; fervent in spirit; serving the Lord;"
Colossians 3:23 (WEB) — "And whatever you do, work heartily, as for the Lord, and not for men,"
2 Timothy 1:6 (WEB) — "For this cause, I remind you that you should stir up the gift of God which is in you through the laying on of my hands."
Psalm 69:9 (WEB) — "For the zeal of your house consumes me. The reproaches of those who reproach you have fallen on me."
1 Corinthians 9:24 (WEB) — "Don’t you know that those who run in a race all run, but one receives the prize? Run like that, that you may win."
body: Holy zeal is love in motion—diligent hands, a focused heart, and endurance for the race marked out by God. Fan into flame the gift He has given and pour yourself out for His glory.
prayer: Lord, ignite my affections for You. Focus my energy on what pleases You and strengthen me to run with endurance until I see Your face. Amen.
